attributes.action: Request that Harry and Meghan don't invite Donald Trump to their wedding.
attributes.background: A royal wedding is a personal celebration of their support for each other's views and values, not a political event.  Trump has bragged about forcing himself on women, is anti-Muslim & anti-immigrant, is a bully & a liar and doesn't deserve to be present at such a nationally important occasion.

rejection.details: Decisions about invitations to the royal wedding are for Prince Harry and Ms Meghan Markle to take, not the UK Government or Parliament.
